item.title: CTF Writeup: RootMe
item.description: Introduction Here, I’m going to show how I solved the RootMe CTF on TryHackMe. It’s supposed to be for beginners so let’s jump in and find out! Reconnaissance Weâ€™ll start with nmap to run a TCP SYN scan with some parallelism and collect service version information as well: sudo nmap -sS -sV --min-parallelism 20 10.10.48.220 Note: we need to run SYN scans with escalated privileges because it is a more stealthy scan than say a TCP Connect scan.
